original_text:
Bloxx Arctic
Caratteristiche e grafica di Bloxx Arctic
Il provider Swintt ha deciso di creare una nuova slot con il sistema Bloxx già ammirato in Bloxx Fruit e che ha conquistato milioni di giocatori in tutto il mondo.
L’ambientazione di questa slot sono le nevi perenni dell’Antartide, con piccole stalattiti di ghiaccio che pendono sulla griglia. Il colore predominante, il blu, si ritrova nel cielo stellato sullo sfondo ma anche sulla trama dei rulli e pure nella maggior parte dei simboli, disegnati in modo impeccabile dai grafici della Swintt.
La musica di accompagnamento, un motivetto incalzante ben congegnato, può essere disattivato in ogni momento dal menù delle impostazioni.
Cosa troviamo in Bloxx Arctic
Come detto in precedenza, questo gioco sfrutta il gameplay denominato Bloxx. In pratica abbiamo due griglie speculari: la prima, sempre attiva, accoglie i simboli e si comporta come una normalissima griglia; nella seconda invece troviamo dei blocchi con degli importi che rimangono inermi per la maggior parte del tempo, salvo di tanto in tanto variare. Per il funzionamento vi rimandiamo al paragrafo successivo.
Entrambe le griglie hanno 5 rulli e 3 righe con 30 linee di pagamento fisse. La puntata minima è di 10 monete virtuali e si può ottenere una vincita massima pari a 3.500 volte la puntata.
Con la funziona Autospin si possono attivare da 10 a 100 giri automatici. Per chi vuole avere sotto controllo il proprio saldo, c’è la possibilità di inserire dei limiti di vinciti di vincita e di perdita oltre i quali il gioco automatico si fermerà.
Dalla stessa pagina dell’Autoplay si può anche disattivare la funzione Gamble, che permette al giocatore di tentare di raddoppiare la vincita o di perderla del tutto.
In Bloxx Arctic, il ritorno teorico al giocatore (RTP) è del 95,47%.
Diverse tipologie di simboli
In Bloxx Arctic troviamo diversi gruppi di simboli che possiamo riassumere in basso livello, alto livello e speciale. Le carte da gioco buone per una scala reale appartengono alla prima categoria, mentre il fiocco di neve, l’alce, l’orso, i fiocchi di neve e il lupo ricompensano con cifre ben più alte.
Gli speciali sono la ragazza delle nevi, il nostro Wild, che sostituisce tutti i simboli tranne lo Scatter. La punta di ghiaccio è lo Scatter e se ne atterrarono almeno 3 durante lo stesso Spin, ci ricompensa con 10 giri gratuiti. Entrambi questi simboli sono anche paganti.
Veniamo ora al dollaro, direttamente connesso con la funzione Bloxx: quando sulla griglia base appaiono almeno tre simboli adiacenti, le stesse posizioni nella griglia speculare si illuminano e vinceremo la somma degli importi contenuti nei blocchi selezionati. Dopo la vincita, i blocchi vincenti vengono rimossi e sostituiti da altri con nuovi importi. Inoltre, il dollaro può essere sostituito dal Wild per la creazione di una combo pagante.

Domande Frequenti 
Come si attiva la funzione Bloxx?

Ogni volta che sulla griglia regolare atterrano tre simboli adiacenti del dollaro partendo dal primo rullo e procedendo verso destra, vinceremo gli importi indicati nelle stesse posizioni della griglia speculare.



Posso giocare a Bloxx Arctic anche da smartphone?

Assolutamente sì, questa slot è disponibile in versione HTML5, adatta quindi per ogni dispositivo portatile



Quanto è la vincita massima di Bloxx Arctic?

Si può ottenere una cifra corrispondente a 3.500x la puntata.

raw_translation.response:
Bloxx Arctic

The Features and Graphics of Bloxx Arctic

Swintt, the game provider, has created a new slot using the Bloxx system, which has already been admired in Bloxx Fruit and has captured millions of players worldwide. The setting of this slot is the perennial snows of Antarctica, with small icicle stalactites hanging over the grid. The predominant color, blue, can be found in the starry sky in the background, as well as on the reel grid and most of the symbols, impeccably designed by Swintt's graphic designers.

The accompanying music, a well-crafted, catchy tune, can be turned off at any time in the settings menu.

What We Find in Bloxx Arctic

As mentioned earlier, this game uses the gameplay called Bloxx. In practice, we have two mirrored grids: the first, always active, welcomes symbols and behaves like a normal grid; in the second, we find blocks with amounts that remain immobile for the most part, except for occasional changes. For operation, please refer to the next paragraph.

Both grids have 5 reels and 3 rows with 30 fixed paylines. The minimum bet is 10 virtual coins, and you can get a maximum win of up to 3,500 times the bet. With the Autospin function, you can activate 10 to 100 automatic spins. For those who want to keep their balance under control, it is possible to set win and loss limits beyond which the automatic game stops.

From the same Autoplay page, you can also disable the Gamble function, which allows the player to try to double the win or lose it entirely. In Bloxx Arctic, the theoretical return to player (RTP) is 95.47%.

Different Types of Symbols

In Bloxx Arctic, we find different groups of symbols that can be summarized as low level, high level, and special. The good poker cards for a straight belong to the first category, while the snowflake, moose, bear, snowflakes, and wolf reward with much higher amounts.

The specials are the snow girl, our Wild, which replaces all symbols except the Scatter. The icicle is the Scatter, and landing at least 3 of them during the same spin rewards us with 10 free spins. Both of these symbols are also paying.

Now let's talk about the dollar, directly related to the Bloxx function: when at least three adjacent dollar symbols appear on the regular grid, the same positions on the mirrored grid light up, and we win the sum of the amounts contained in the selected blocks. After the win, the winning blocks are removed and replaced by others with new amounts. Additionally, the dollar can be replaced by the Wild to create a winning combo.

FAQs

How do I activate the Bloxx feature?

Every time three adjacent dollar symbols land on the regular grid starting from the first reel and moving to the right, we'll win the amounts indicated in the same positions on the mirrored grid.

Can I play Bloxx Arctic on my smartphone?

Absolutely yes, this slot is available in HTML5 version, suitable for any portable device.

What is the maximum win in Bloxx Arctic?

You can get a figure corresponding to 3,500x the bet.

Review: Bloxx Arctic

The Features and Graphics of Bloxx Arctic

Swintt, the game provider, has created a new slot using the Bloxx system, which has already been admired in Bloxx Fruit and has captured millions of players worldwide. The setting of this slot is the perennial snows of Antarctica, with small icicle stalactites hanging over the grid. The predominant color, blue, can be found in the starry sky in the background, as well as on the reel grid and most of the symbols, impeccably designed by Swintt's graphic designers.

The accompanying music, a well-crafted, catchy tune, can be turned off at any time in the settings menu.

What We Find in Bloxx Arctic

As mentioned earlier, this game uses the gameplay called Bloxx. In practice, we have two mirrored grids: the first, always active, welcomes symbols and behaves like a normal grid; in the second, we find blocks with amounts that remain immobile for the most part, except for occasional changes. For operation, please refer to the next paragraph.

Both grids have 5 reels and 3 rows with 30 fixed paylines. The minimum bet is 10 virtual coins, and you can get a maximum win of up to 3,500 times the bet. With the Autospin function, you can activate 10 to 100 automatic spins. For those who want to keep their balance under control, it is possible to set win and loss limits beyond which the automatic game stops.

From the same Autoplay page, you can also disable the Gamble function, which allows the player to try to double the win or lose it entirely. In Bloxx Arctic, the theoretical return to player (RTP) is 95.47%.

Different Types of Symbols

In Bloxx Arctic, we find different groups of symbols that can be summarized as low level, high level, and special. The good poker cards for a straight belong to the first category, while the snowflake, moose, bear, snowflakes, and wolf reward with much higher amounts.

The specials are the snow girl, our Wild, which replaces all symbols except the Scatter. The icicle is the Scatter, and landing at least 3 of them during the same spin rewards us with 10 free spins. Both of these symbols are also paying.

Now let's talk about the dollar, directly related to the Bloxx function: when at least three adjacent dollar symbols appear on the regular grid, the same positions on the mirrored grid light up, and we win the sum of the amounts contained in the selected blocks. After the win, the winning blocks are removed and replaced by others with new amounts. Additionally, the dollar can be replaced by the Wild to create a winning combo.

FAQs

How do I activate the Bloxx feature?

Every time three adjacent dollar symbols land on the regular grid starting from the first reel and moving to the right, we'll win the amounts indicated in the same positions on the mirrored grid.

Can I play Bloxx Arctic on my smartphone?

Absolutely yes, this slot is available in HTML5 version, suitable for any portable device.

What is the maximum win in Bloxx Arctic?

You can get a figure corresponding to 3,500x the bet.

The Features and Graphics of Bloxx Arctic

Swintt's Bloxx Arctic is a visually stunning online slot game set in Antarctica, with small icicle stalactites, a blue starry sky, and beautifully designed symbols by Swintt's graphic designers. In addition, the Bloxx system, which is already known for Bloxx Fruit, has two mirrored grids and unique symbols that make it stand out in the crowded slot market.

What We Find in Bloxx Arctic

Bloxx Arctic uses two mirrored grids of 5 reels and 3 rows with 30 fixed paylines. The minimum bet is 10 virtual coins, and the maximum win is 3,500 times the bet. Different Types of Symbols

Bloxx Arctic features different symbol categories such as low level, high level, and special symbols. The low-level symbols include good poker cards for a straight, while high-level symbols are snowflake, moose, bear, snowflakes, and wolf with higher payouts. The special symbols consist of the snow girl (Wild), icicle (Scatter), and dollar (related to the Bloxx function). The Wild replaces all symbols except the Scatter, and landing 3 Scatters during the same spin rewards the player with 10 free spins. Notably, the dollar is directly related to the Bloxx feature, which activates when at least three adjacent dollar symbols appear on the regular grid, and it is explained in the next section.

Bonus Feature and How to Trigger It

Bloxx Arctic's main bonus feature is called Bloxx, and it is triggered when at least three adjacent dollar symbols land on the regular grid from the first reel to the right. The same positions on the mirrored grid light up, and the player wins the sum of the amounts contained in the selected blocks. After the win, the winning blocks are removed and replaced by others with new amounts. Additionally, the dollar can be replaced by the Wild to create a winning combo.

Compatibility and Accessibility

Bloxx Arctic is available in HTML5 version, making it compatible with any portable device such as tablets and smartphones.
